name: Brainard Lake Road
description: Nestled in the Indian Peaks Wilderness, this campsite offers stunning alpine views and serene lakeside spots. Perfect for hikers and photographers seeking high-altitude tranquility.

name: Switzerland Trail
description: Situated amidst towering pines near Sugarloaf Mountain, this campsite provides a peaceful retreat with easy access to hiking trails and scenic overlooks. Ideal for families and adventurers looking for a relaxing getaway.

name: Hidden Wilderness Road
description: Tucked away near Idaho Springs, this hidden gem offers secluded camping spots amid lush forests and panoramic mountain views. Perfect for those seeking quiet wilderness escapes.

name: Ski Road
description: Close to Rocky Mountain National Park, this campsite offers proximity to skiing and winter sports. In summer, it transforms into a serene retreat with access to hiking trails and mountain vistas.

name: Jones Pass Road
description: High up near Empire, this campsite boasts breathtaking views of the surrounding peaks and valleys. It's a favorite among off-road enthusiasts and nature lovers.

name: Storm Mountain Road
description: Surrounded by towering cliffs and lush forests, this campsite near Drake offers easy access to fishing spots and scenic drives. Ideal for families and nature enthusiasts seeking a tranquil mountain retreat.

name: Lost Park Road
description: Set amidst the rugged beauty of Lost Creek Wilderness, this campsite offers challenging hikes and stunning geological formations. Perfect for adventurers seeking remote wilderness experiences.

name: Kebler Pass
description: Known for its vibrant aspen groves, this campsite near Crested Butte offers unparalleled fall foliage views and access to hiking and mountain biking trails.

name: Cottonwood Pass
description: Perched atop Cottonwood Pass, this campsite offers panoramic views of the Collegiate Peaks and access to high-altitude hiking trails. Ideal for those seeking alpine adventures.

name: Dominguez Canyon Road
description: Nestled along Dominguez Canyon, this campsite features desert landscapes, hiking trails, and opportunities for birdwatching. Perfect for exploring unique southwestern terrain.

name: Rabbit Valley Road
description: Situated in the rugged beauty of McInnis Canyons National Conservation Area, this campsite offers dramatic desert views and access to hiking, biking, and rock climbing.

name: Pingree Park Road
description: Located amidst the scenic beauty of Pingree Park, this campsite offers access to hiking trails, fishing streams, and breathtaking mountain vistas.

name: Laramie River Road
description: Scenic campsite nestled along the Laramie River with opportunities for fishing and relaxing by the water. Offers mountain views and serene natural surroundings.

name: South Saint Vrain Creek
description: Riverside campsite offering peaceful views of South Saint Vrain Creek and surrounding mountains. Ideal for anglers and nature enthusiasts seeking a tranquil getaway.
